text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus grisea is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is found in Malaysia, the Philippines, Singapore, and Taiwan.It was published and described by Cornelis Kalkman in 'Blumea' vol.13 on page 56 in 1965.
text.References: Kalkman, C. (1998). "Prunus grisea". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31340A9627801. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31340A9627801.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
